item.title: PictureFeature
item.author: liudongdong1
item.description: Suárez, Iago, et al. “BEBLID: Boosted efficient binary local image descriptor.” Pattern Recognition Letters 133 (2020): 366-372. Paper: BEBLID: Summary BEBLID, an efficient learned binary image descriptor; achieves an accuracy close to SIFT and better computational efficiency than ORB. BEBLID details: use the integral image to efficiently compute the difference between the mean gray values in a pair of square image regions. use the
